org.anarres.qemu.exec.util

Class QEmuIdAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.qemu.exec.util.QEmuIdAllocator

  • public class QEmuIdAllocator
extends Object
    An allocator for unique drive, network and PCI addresses. This class is basically a set of incrementing counters.
